mapper.insert: insert into member(mname, mpwd, memail, mphoto, mbirth, mtel, mgender) values (#{mname}, password(#{mpwd}), #{memail}, #{mphoto}, #{mbirth}, #{mtel}, #{mgender})
mapper.select: select mno, mname, memail, mphoto, mbirth, mtel, mgender, mcnt from member where mno = #{value}
mapper.update: update member set mphoto = #{mphoto}, mpwd = password(#{mpwd}) where mno = #{no}
